org.ietf.nea.pb.message

Class AbstractPbMessageValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pb.message.AbstractPbMessageValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Data, TnccsMessageValue, TnccsData, PbMessageValue
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PbMessageValueAccessRecommendation, PbMessageValueAssessmentResult, PbMessageValueError, PbMessageValueExperimental, PbMessageValueIm, PbMessageValueLanguagePreference, PbMessageValueReasonString, PbMessageValueRemediationParameters

    public abstract class AbstractPbMessageValue
extends Object
implements PbMessageValue
    Generic IETF RFC 5793 TNCCS message value base. Especially important for inheritance.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private long length 
      private boolean omittable 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected AbstractPbMessageValue(long length)
      Creates the TNCCS message value base with the given value length, that is omittable.
      protected AbstractPbMessageValue(long length, boolean omittable)
      Creates the TNCCS message value base with the given values.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getLength()
      Returns the length of the message value.
      boolean isOmittable()
      Returns true if the message can be ignored if it cannot be handled or successfully parsed.
